text: Gasthof Herold is one of the oldest breweries in Büchenbach, Bavaria, Germany, founded in 1568. Since the foundation it is a family business today managed by Johann und Matthias Herold and the annual production is about 1200 hl. The part of the business is a bakery, restaurant and a beer garden. == See also == *List of oldest companies == References == == External links == *Homepage *Location on Google Maps Category:Breweries in Germany Category:Beer brands of Germany Category:Companies established in the 16th century Category:16th- century establishments in Germany Category:Food and drink companies established in the 16th century
title: Gasthof Herold
